# Płowce, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Płowce  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Stare Juchy, within Ełk County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It is located in Masuria. It lies approximately  south-west of Stare Juchy,  north-west of Ełk, and  east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
